titles.title: Secure the Southwest Border Act of 2014
Secure the Southwest Border Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2014
A bill making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 527.
